content: “Here’s the thing: I don’t doubt that Wallace is a genius. And it’s not that I believe there’s no value in self-indulgent works by men. It’s just that I’m not very interested in them. These men seem to think I’m saying the thing they love is bad, when really I’m just saying I don’t care about the thing they love.” You are amazing. I loved every bit of this piece, but it’s the quote above that really nailed my own unformed feelings about DFW (and Barth, and Bolano, and so on) and the men who can’t just be cool with my lack of interest. Thank you!
